Package com.nitay.couponproject.dal

Class CustomersDBDAO

java.lang.Object
com.nitay.couponproject.dal.CustomersDBDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
CustomersDAO
public class CustomersDBDAO
extends java.lang.Object
implements CustomersDAO
A singleton data access object, Implements CustomersDAO to make CRUD operations on a SQL database. CustomersDBDAO is connected to the ConnectionPool and used in the facades.
See Also:
CustomersDAO, ConnectionPool, ClientFacade
